Über das Auslandspraktikum in Estland

Introduction

Dear readers,
Welcome to my blog, which is being written on the occasion of my internship in the Estonian capital, Tallinn.

Over the next 2 months, from June 25th to August 25th, I will take you on this journey and present to you as best as I can the cultural and recreational wonders of the country, as well as my work related activities.

Estonia, a small country in northern Europe, has captivated me from the very beginning with its architectural and natural beauty, its rich history, and it's integrated IT-sector into the social life of everyday citizens.

I look forward to engage, entertain, and perhaps even inspire you to explore Tallinn, Estonia and the rest of world for yourselves.
Join me on this exciting journey and let us discover together the wonders and beauty of this country!


Why Estonia?

Due to startup-friendly regulations Estonia has built up a reputation for beeing a good place to create a company.
Over the years many new small and innovative companies were founded in Estonia and today it hosts the most startups per capita in Europe.

This is helped by the fact, that you are able to become an e-citizen by signing in online on the official Estonian website.
Doing taxes, booking an doctors appointment or identifying yourself is beeing streamlined and digitalized.
All of this leads to a zeitgeist
Des weiteren noch nie so weit im norden, kleines land, nicht typisch
